titleStmt.title: A few words of counsel and advice to all the sons and daughters of men, more especially to the children of believers from the motion of Gods spirit upon my heart, in the love of God that they may come to lead the course of their lives in this world, so as to lay down their heads in peace with the Lord, when time in this world shall be no more.
titleStmt.author: Tompkins, Anthony, d. 1699.
Needham, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Anthony Tompkins. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Also contains A short testimony sprang and opened in my heart / Richard Needham.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
